RefParameter.Name: DAC_DMADoubleDataMode

RefParameter.Name: DAC_SampleTime
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Sample time for the selected channel.

RefParameter.Name: DAC_HoldTime
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the hold time for the selected channel This parameter applies when DAC_SampleAndHold is DAC_SAMPLEANDHOLD_ENABLE.

RefParameter.Name: DAC_RefreshTime
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the refresh time for the selected channel This parameter applies when DAC_SampleAndHold is DAC_SAMPLEANDHOLD_ENABLE.

Mode.Name: DAC_OUT1_Int
Mode.UserName: OUT1 Connected to on chip-peripherals only

Mode.UserName: OUT2 Connected to on chip-peripherals only
